strings:
<voice_0x01001472><se_def>Marcello: Well, well, who have we here?
Haven't we met somewhere before?

<voice_0x01001473><se_def>Angelo: I see your memory's got worse.
How much older than me are you, brother?
<voice_0x01001474><se_def>Marcello: Ah, yes! The persistent rule-breaker I had to expel from the abbey.

<voice_0x01001476><se_def>Marcello: Ah, enough fun!
I do hope I didn't cause any offence.

<voice_0x01001477><se_def>Marcello: Anyway, no time for idle chit-chat.
I have to select men to form the
Lord High Priest's personal guard.

<voice_0x01001478><se_def>Marcello: The luxury of a carefree existence such as
yours is not something I can afford.
So if you'll excuse me.

<voice_0x01001479><se_def>Marcello: Be well.
And may the Goddess keep a close eye on you.

<voice_0x0100147A><se_def>*: It's indecent!
How does a nobody like him get to become master of the Lord High Priest's guards?

<voice_0x0100147B><se_def>*: Such an important responsibility demands
a person of repute! Someone of character,
like you or I.
<voice_0x0100147C><se_def>*: No doubt that peasant bribed His Holiness. I've heard rumours about him.
<voice_0x0100147D><se_def>*: It won't last. He'll never be anything more than a watchdog. He's enjoyed all the promotion he's going to get.

<voice_0x0100147E><se_def>*: This is as far as his money will take him.
The burden of his lowly origins will soon bring him crashing back down to earth.
